features.title: Long-term planning

longDescription: A beautifully sculpted jawline frames the entire face. Our doctors customise each plan using hyaluronic acid fillers for structure, neuromodulators or fat-dissolving for slimming, and collagen stimulators for long-lasting lift. The result? A sharper profile, a more balanced chin, and a camera-ready lower face—without downtime.

faq.answer: Only if that’s your goal. We customise ratio and angles for each face.
faq.question: Will it look masculine?
How long do results last?
faq.answer: Filler lasts 12-18 months; masseter slimming needs a refresher every 6 months.

description: Combination chin and jawline treatments using filler, slimming injectables, and skin tightening to sculpt a confident profile.

title: Jawline Sculpting & Contour

overview.content: We analyse your lower face angles, bite, and skin laxity before layering solutions: filler for structure, botulinum toxin for masseter slimming, fat-dissolving for jowls, and collagen stimulators for lift. Every injection is mapped and recorded so touch-ups remain precise.
highlights: Masseter slimming for softer lower face
Suitable for both feminine and masculine goals
